Fusce ullamcorper feugiat commodo. Donec aliquam arcu quis nulla dictum commodo. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

Extreme Way of the Cross is a form of spirituality, which for many people becomes a way of life. The real Meeting with Him in the middle of the Struggle makes you don't want to live normally any more - but live extremely, which means: fully.

Extreme Way of the Cross is a proposed form of spirituality.

It's not a pilgrimage.
EWC consists in covering the chosen route during the night, contemplating reflections and struggling with ones' weaknesses.
It's an event of individual kind; if any unpredictable things happen during your walk, you can rely only on yourself.

More info can be found on our website:

This app helps you experience the Extreme Way of the Cross fully.

GPS navigation and directions attached to each station let you focus on beating your weaknesses, not bothering about the details.

However EWC is mainly a form of spirituality. Contemplation of attached reflections allows for closer Encounter with Him.

The author of the app is Pawe≈Ç Wawrzynek. If you have any suggestions, let us know!

Way of the Cross can be painful. We propose, that you work it out at the distance of about 40 km, at night, in silence and loneliness. 
EWC is: Challenge, Way, Struggle, Encounter. 
 
Examples of routes to follow you can find here in the application as well as on our website. You can also create your own route. 
If you have an idea of a new route or want to create an EWC area - please contact us. 
 
More info to find at:
Are you sure you want to quit?
GPS is off - your position will not be precisely defined
Unexpected error occurred when loading the route
No areas found. Connect to the internet and try again
Info about routes in chosen area is unavailable
An error occurred during loading stations\' coordinates.
Do you want to see also routes from previous editions? (The choice can be changed in the settings)
Enables notifications about being out-of-route. Increases battery consumption.
Automatic map panning to newest position.
Center the map on current position
Rotates the map so that your walking direction points to the map top. Works only with centering turned on.
Update list of voivodeships and cities, where EWC takes place
Update details of already downloaded routes
Download newest audio files with recorded reflections
Download of audio reflections has completed.
Failed to download audio reflections. Please try again later.
Some of the files could not be downloaded. Try to update later.
Audio reflections are available. Do you want to download them now (about 50MB)?
Failed to download reflections. Check internet connection and try again.
Data update finished (audio download can be done in background).
App needs all permissions to work properly. In order to use it, change the settings
Cannot play audio file - access error.
App needs all permissions to work properly. Do you want to go to settings section and change permissions?
App has no permission to write to device storage. This permission is necessary to be able to show track on map and to use audio reflections.

App has no permission to write to device storage. This permission is necessary to be able to show track on map and to use audio reflections. Do you want to go to settings section and change permissions?
App has no permission to use GPS. This permission is necessary to be able to use maps. Do you want to go to settings section and change permissions?
